column5: Took this a couple days ago on my dads boathouse. Fairly large one but have seen bigger ones. This one is protecting it's nest. It was there for several days.
That looks like the ferocious shed spider....very similar to the dock spider except....  Oh forget it....bad joke....I'm not feeling that witty this morning.... LOL
I see them all the time at Nipissing. Apparently they can get really big but only seen medium sized ones.
When in doubt simply compare to the Wood Spyder
Here's a Camel Spider..
And here is the Eclipse Spyder!
Bombardier Spyder
Danbo, how did you get that picture of my car??
It sure is sweet, bro!
Back to fishing...The Berkley spider.
I spider.
Why you lil' rascal,you!
do they bite?
They're deadly "Man-eaters!"
I think everything with fangs and a mouth bites.
